structure.unit: SANITARIANS, WATER PLANT OPERATORS, AND WATER WELL CONSTRUCTION PRACTICES

law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 561, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 505, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 309, sec. 2, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 299, sec. 43. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 88. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 102, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1960.
